name: Air Penguin Origin
description:
Enjoyed by 40 million people!
Let's build an igloo with ice cubes!
Enjoy the whole family together!
■■■■■ Game Introduction ■■■■■
Air Penguin 1, enjoyed by 40 million people around the world, is back!
A tilt game that can be played by men and women of all ages.
■■■■■ Game Features ■■■■■
■Feel the feeling of operation and fun of the tilt which is separated from simple play made only by touch.
- You can control the movement of the character according to the tilt of the mobile phone.
■Beautiful and cute design
- Meet the newly renovated Air Penguin Original!
■Join new friends
- Added characters such as Malamute and Snowy.
■Cute 3D Characters
- Unique Air Penguin characters with adorable movements.
- Raise your characters and use character-specific skills to clear difficult stages.
■Igloo system
- Upgrade your Igloo for stage progression.
